Jeremiah or Jeremias__17.6__Tamaric: : A barren shrub that grows in the driest parts of the wilderness.
Jeremiah or Jeremias__17.18__Let them be confounded: : Such expressions as these in the writings of the prophets, are not to be understood as imprecations proceeding from malice or desire of revenge: but as prophetic predictions of evils that were about to fall upon impenitent sinners, and approbations of the ways of divine justice.
